FullTitle: 22¬™ Conven√ß√£o Brasileira de Malabarismo e Circo
Blurb:
A 22¬™ CBMC acontece de 11 a 17 de Novembro de 2024 em Vinhedo (SP).  ‚ÄúO grande encontro‚Äù busca unir gera√ß√µes que se nutrem do projeto para os diversos modos do fazer Circense em todo o Brasil.

A 22¬™ CbmCirco ser√° o espa√ßo perfeito para criar conex√µes, adquirir conhecimentos, estar no meio de uma grande diversidade cultural, se inspirar e inovar, estabelecer parcerias e celebrar a ARTE.

Everything will be inside one building: 2 gyms, dormitories, cafeteria.
Breakfast and evening meals included, open stage on Saturday.
Some more information on the registration website.

The Jugglers of the University of Guelph will be hosting a mini juggling festival for all! Join us for games, workshops, an open show and a weekend filled with joy! More details on specific location within campus will come soon. 

If you are interested in either running a fun workshop or showing off your skills in the open Saturday night show, please fill out the form found in this post. If you have any questions, you can message @jugglersofguelph on Instagram or email jouguelph@gmail.com.

Our favourite co-created Circus festival is happening again and we are happy to welcome you!

As always, you can expect plenty of inspiring workshops, tasty vegan food, and lots of playtime, cuddles and creativity! Choose between a variety of workshops, consisting of Acroyoga, Standing partner acrobatics at different levels, as well as Object manipulation, Aerials, Martial arts, Yoga, Dance and Thai yoga Massage and more. You might also have a specific skill and want to offer a workshop yourself.

H√∂stgl√∂d is a co-created festival aimed for adults who are interested in Circus related training. Children under 16 years are welcome, in the company of parents (for safety reasons), however keep in mind that the workshops are mainly aimed to suit adults.

ü§∏WORKSHOPS:
There will be several parallel circus related workshops, some teachers have already signed up but there are still plenty of space for wishes and your contributions. 

SLEEPING
We will be sleeping in the (very big) training hall. Hall will be quiet and dimmed lights from 23:00.

OPEN STAGE & FIRE SHOW
Saturday evening we‚Äôll have our traditional Open stage, followed by a Fire show! Everyone is welcome and encouraged to perform at the Open stage. If you are interested in this, you can sign up for it at the event.

Spots are limited, so secure your spot as soon as possible! Last year they ran out about 1.5 months before the event!
Looking forward to see you!

 The organising team, Cikus√∂n and NBV
Address: Albert Hall i L√•ngared, L√•ngaredsv√§gen 91, Alings√•s

Blurb:
This year we have the sports hall for a full 10 hours of three club combat and open juggling (10am to 8pm) so we have time for lots more than just a single tournament! Even if you didn't get an invite to the main event, everyone is welcome to join in with Team combat, Zombie combat, melee combat and more.

Preliminary schedule:

10:00 - 11:00 - Open melee combat / open juggling.

11:00 - 13:00 - Team combat tournament (mixed doubles).

13:00 - 14:00 - Lunch break / open juggling.

14:00 - 15:30 - European Championships Open and Women's group stage matches.

16:00 - 17:30 - The European Championships 2023 Open and Women's knockout matches.

18:00 - 20:00 - Zombie Combat / open juggling.

20:00 - Dinner.

22:00 - Party.


Player Qualification
An automatic invite into the European Championships Open tournament is extended to the winners of the four Major Tournaments (typically the British, Netherlands, Berlin, and EJC Fight Nights), as long as they live in Europe and have taken part in at least two other tournaments in the 2024 season.

On November 4th 2024, the top 7 players in the 2024 Open Race Rankings will receive a direct invite, so long as they live in Europe and have taken part in at least three tournaments in the 2024 season.

The eighth invite is held open for a wildcard entry, and will be awarded to a highly ranked player who doesn't meet the previous invite criteria (eg. Wes Peden in 2019 for winning the EJC but not taking part in any other tournament, Yaron Davidovich in 2022 for being highly ranked but living outside of Europe). If a wildcard invite isn't needed or a suitable juggler can't be found, the 8th ranked juggler in the Open Race Rankings will be invited. If they aren't available, a wildcard tournament will be held at the European Championships event in advance of the main tournament.

Qualification into the Women's tournament will follow the same rules, based on the 2024 Womens Race Rankings.

Participation in the Team Combat tournament will be finalised on the day. The tournament is for mixed doubles pairings. The plan for the tournament structure is group stage qualifying (seeded by the combined rankings of the players), followed by a knockout tournament with the top eight teams.

Blurb:
Yuhuu finally another Configuvention!

Shortly after New Year's Eve, over 150 artists from all over Europe will once again be coming to Aachen to take part in the 7th Configuvention.

You can expect: 
Juggling, acrobatics, aerial acrobatics, club-combat, fire space, juggling games, shows, open stages and much more!

You can find all the details on our website!

We are really looking forward to seeing you and to a super awesome convention! <3

The 11th Annual Club Congress! 

Tickets go LIVE Oct 1 @ 7:00pm PDT
Get them here: https://events.humanitix.com/club-congress-2025

For the First Time Ever! There will be 2 weekends of Club Congress Back to back. Jan 9th-12th and Jan 16th - 19th

Tickets will be available for the 2 weekends separately.
Our aim is to increase the number of people who can participate while retaining the small private event feel.

Stay tuned for important updates. Tickets will go on Sale October 1st at 7:00PM PDT! Mark your calendars

We also are planning several Club Workshops in between the events at Flowtoys!

Blurb:
Dear jugglers,

Last year, we organized the Goirle Juggling Festival for the first time, and it was a huge success! That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre doing it again, this time from February 7th to 9th, 2025. Mark your calendars!

At which festival can you find a gym that‚Äôs open 24 hours a day, all-day breakfast and lunch, beds, healthy catered meals, and a giant game room with cozy couches?! Exactly, at the GJF!

The location is ActiveStay in Goirle (https://activestay.nl/), which has several dormitories with bunk beds, a 400 m¬≤ hall, a large relaxation area right next to the hall for games (with a ping pong table and foosball table!!!), and a dining room with a kitchen where we can prepare our own breakfast and lunch. There are plenty of judo mats to create an acrobatics area, and of course, there‚Äôs all the space you need for juggling. Unfortunately, unicycling and aerial work aren‚Äôt possible in the hall.

Registration for the second edition of the GJF is now open!
 
Get your tickets quickly, as there are limited spots. If you want to stay overnight, it‚Äôs only possible to buy a full weekend ticket due to bed occupancy. We are now also offering day passes for Saturday.

Any further questions can be sent to gjf@stichtingnjf.nl

We hope to see many of you in Goirle in February!

Cheers,
Piet and Mees

FullTitle: Aotearoa New Zealand Juggling and Circus Festival 2025
Blurb: This time we are heading north to the wonderful town of Paparoa for three days of workshops, shows and circus goodness! It's been over ten years since we brought the festival to Northland and we can't wait to do it again! The festival bring together some of the country's top jugglers & circus performers, whether you're a seasoned pro or a complete beginner, this festival is for you. We will have plenty of workshops for all abilities and ages, we can introduce you to new skills or improve ones you might already have in your pocket. This is the event you don't want to miss!

Chocolate Cake and Juggling - Chocfest 2025 will be choc-full of fun.

New this year we will have aerial and acro areas. See facebook event for acts and workshops.

Saturday 15th February 2025.
Doors open at 10am. Show at 7pm.
Free parking
Tickets available on the door only:
Adults: ¬£10
Adult with Cake or Concessions: ¬£5
Under 18s: ¬£5
Under 5s: Free
We will have a card machine.
As always, free tea, biscuits and coffee will be available. Bring a mug!
Show 7pm-9pm

Chocolate cake:
-During the interval of the show there will be a chance to try the cakes from the competition.
If you would like to enter the chocolate cake competition there are a few things to know:
- The judging categories will be; Chocolatiness, Cakeyness, Taste, Presentation and judges bias.
- When submitting your cake, we will provide a card you will need to fill in regarding dietary information. So please make note of your ingredients.
Address: Exhibition Centre, University of York, West Campus, YO10 5NA

Blurb:
The 2025 Hawai‚Äôi island JuggleFest ‚Äì an exciting event for juggling enthusiasts of all levels and ages! Join us for three days of juggling festivities at the Seaview Performing Arts Center for Education in wild and wonderful Puna, Hawai‚Äôi.

Get ready for three days filled with juggling workshops, games, performances, and a vibrant juggling and circus community. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned pro, young or older, this festival offers something for everyone.

You‚Äôll have the opportunity to attend various workshops led by experienced jugglers. Learn new tricks, improve your technique, and expand your juggling repertoire. Don‚Äôt forget to bring your own juggling AND flow props!

Witness awe-inspiring performances by talented jugglers from around the world. Be prepared to be amazed by their incredible skills and creativity. You might even discover a new favorite juggling act!

Aside from the juggling activities, there will be plenty of opportunities to connect with fellow jugglers and exchange tips and tricks. Share your passion, make new friends, and experience the sense of community that makes juggling so special.

Mark your calendars and join us for the Big Island Juggle Fest. It‚Äôs going to be a day filled with laughter, skill, and unforgettable juggling moments. See you there!
Address: SPACE, 12-253 West Pohakupele Loop, PƒÅhoa, HI 96778

FullTitle: Rochester Institute of Technology 45th Annual Spring Juggle-In
Blurb: The annual Juggle-In hosted by the RIT Juggling Club! Has been posted for (nearly) 45 consecutive years. The gym floor opens Friday at 6pm for the public which will lead to our open-stage show. The gym floor will reopen the next morning at 10am. Saturday will be filled with various events alongside the open floor. At the end of the day, our gala public show will be Saturday night. Sunday, the floor will reopen and there will be more events until the end of the event at 3pm.

The second largest juggling event in the world with ~2000 attendees will be happening for the 32nd time! Jugglers from all over the world, hundreds of workshops, shows and special events, and will be happening in a beautiful national park with pools and waterfalls.
a 500 points tournament! come and watch the nicest jugglers turn to fighting beasts (alongside beautiful pools and kosher food!)

Blurb: Pour cette √©dition 2025, la Bigoud revient √† Vezin du 8 au 11 mai !

Flow Arts Convention bei Berlin

Flow Arts ‚Ä¢ Yoga ‚Ä¢ Healing ‚Ä¢ Workshops ‚Ä¢ LED & Firespinning

Ostflimmern ‚Äì eine rote Sonne erstrahlt im Morgengrauen, ein bunter Osthimmel erleuchtet den neuen Tag, frische Erinnerungen an eine lange Nacht tanzen mit den Flammen‚Ä¶

Unsere Vision f√ºr die zweite Convention ist ein spielerisches, kreatives und gemeinsames Erlebnis von verschiedenen Flow Arts und Feuertanz.

Mit unserer langj√§hrigen Erfahrung in der Organisation von Flow-Events und der Integration einiger der Kernwerte der Burn-Prinzipien freuen wir uns darauf, gemeinsam mit euch ein fantastisches Wochenende zu gestalten.

Viele Workshops, magische Musik, ein gro√üartiger Veranstaltungsort zum Entdecken, heilende R√§ume, mehrere Tage gemeinsames Zelten, beruhigende Meditationen, unglaubliche (Akro-)Yoga-Erfahrungen und nat√ºrlich die langen N√§chte, tanzen mit den Flammen ‚Äì von der D√§mmerung bis zum Morgengrauen.

Das sind nur einige Dinge, die dich im Jahr 2025 bei Ostflimmern erwarten‚Ä¶ wir freuen uns auf euch!
